messages.subject: Kiyohira
messages.msgSnippet: I have seen a sword by the Kaga shinto smith Kiyohira using Minamoto rather than Fujiwara in the signature, I can t find any reference to him signing this
messages.messageBody:
I have seen a sword by the Kaga shinto smith Kiyohira using 'Minamoto' rather than 'Fujiwara' in the signature, I can't find any reference to him signing this way, the meikan lists half a page of signatures but none using Minamoto. Can anyone help?

Alan

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
